title: Kicked Out of Own Club
body: I was kicked out of my own club that I was the leader of and i have been told that our clan tag has screwed up any fixes?

replies.body: Mine was the opposite they added me to clubs so now im in 5 clubs ahahahahaha
Yeah my also says im still the leader

Hi LoneIcicle,

I'd like to look into this for you. What was the name and tag of your club?
The name was Team WildCard and the tag was "TWC"

I learned after this that we had a process to handle this through tickets, but we're already this far so we might as well try a fix for you.

I've found the club. What needs to happen:

- I remove you from the club
- I set a player of your choosing as the temporary owner
- They re-add you and pass ownership to you

So which club member do you want me to entrust with temporary ownership?
Please help me get back into my club averagejoes club tag ajkb you can make annihilator bot the host

The new solution is to just look your club up to refresh it. I've taken a look at your club on the system, this should refresh its status and it should work for you again. Let me know if you still can't see it.
I have the same issue with my club. Can you help me get back into it?
I can take a look. What is your club name and tag?
can you please put me back in mine?, club is PandaNation , with the tag PANDAN, make  Germanium the temp leader
I've fixed that up for you, no temp leader required anymore for new fix so you should be able to see your club now.
I have also been kicked out of my club that I was the leader in. The club name is PLEASEEE and the tag is uZun. Could you please make Kroos the leader.
Fixed! No need to set a new club owner.

could u fix this for me 2 ?
club name: DualCore . tag: DualC , i Think.
could u make cupofcakes temporary leader ?

//posted 1 time Before

could you fix this for me too please?
club name: are we good?
tag GQD
thank you very much :)
All fixed.

could u fix this for me 2 ?
club name: DualCore .  tag: DualC  , i Think.
could u make cupofcakes temporary leader ?

I have the same, but on my friend's accounts it says i am still the leader of the club.
But on my screen i am not affiliated at all with it, and can't even view it.
I also have been kicked out of my own club. any help would be appreciated!
I have this same issue and posted my own discussion to see if Riot pays any attention to it. I hope they fix this soon. Also I don't have my club tag next to my name anymore either.
Same here. I have been kicked out of my own club.
same to me
Yes I'm in the same boat as well. Pls fix this.
Same here. I am still listed as the owner of the club when other members look at the roster, but for me, it says I am not in any clubs, and I have the option to create one.
I was kicked out of my club as well my club is called average joes club take ajkb.  Please re ad me into it. You can make annihilator bot the new host. Pls and thank you
I have the same problem!

I guess I'll add my name to the list, I was recently kicked out of my club Thug Celery (THUGC). My friends that are in the club say that I'm still listed in it, but it says that I'm offline even when I'm not and my own club list says that I'm not in any clubs at all. I had promoted one of my friends to captain so he has invite power, but when he tried to invite me, a message appeared saying that I was already in the club, even though I can't perform any club functions. Any and all help fixing this is greatly appreciated.
Same thing happened to me, my club has five members, but I don't have any link/tag/connection to the  club I created. Whereas the non-owner members of the club display the tag and everything.
